item.title: Useing a object = logout?
item.dc:creator: @butnugget butnugget
item.description:
@butnugget wrote:

no there is no errors it just logs me off when i use key on chest since i added the slayer xp in… if there was a error that would of been the first thing i would of figured out =p[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 11, 2008, 10:14:17 PM[/size][hr]something that may help…

when if the player is 99 slayer and use the key on the chest it wont log them out…
but if they are not 99 slayer yet it will log them out…

item.title: Useing a object = logout?
item.dc:creator: @butnugget butnugget
item.description:
@butnugget wrote:

ok, in my mini game it all worked fine… untill i made it to give u slayer xp after finishing… it will give slayer xp… but always logs u out after useing the key on the chest now… and it never did this befor… is there something wrong with the way i added it?

this is what i added~ addSkillXP((5000*playerLevel[18]), 18);

[code]sendMessage(“Grats, Round 4 is over, 1 round to go.”);
server.npcHandler.newNPC(509, 2603, 3161, heightLevel, 0, 0, 0, 0, 1, server.npcHandler.GetNpcListHP(509), false);
}

                            if (useItemID == 6104 && atObjectID == 5162)
                            {
			deleteItem(6104, getItemSlot(6104), 1);
			addItem(962, 1);
			addItem(995, 5000000);
			addSkillXP((5000*playerLevel[18]), 18);
			teleportToX = 2162;
			teleportToY = 4833;
                            sendMessage("Gratz, You gain slayer xp and a reward!");
                            }[/code]

befor i made my server npc training only… i had a attack dummy that gave slayer xp (same code) and it loged out out after u attacked it… as well…
don’t know if that would help any… just thought id add more about it… ty for your time.

Read full topic
